original_text: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God, and the Lord has chosen you to be a people for his treasured possession, out of all the peoples who are on the face of the earth.
korean_text: 너는 네 하나님 여호와의 성민이라 여호와께서 지상 만민 중에서 너를 택하여 자기 기업의 백성으로 삼으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와께 속한 거룩한 백성이라,

sentences.original_text: and the Lord has chosen you
to be a people for his treasured possession,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 보물이 될 백성이 되게 하시려고,

sentences.original_text: out of all the peoples who are on the face of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅 위에 있는 모든 민족 중에서.
